common_usage: Daily commute, family car, business transport
description: A passenger car with a three-box configuration and separate compartments for engine, passengers, and cargo.

common_usage: Family trips, off-road adventures, urban driving
description: A sports utility vehicle with higher ground clearance, off-road capability, and spacious interiors.
A two-door car with a sporty look, often with a sloping roofline.

common_usage: City driving, compact and efficient travel
description: A small to mid-size car with a rear door that swings upward to provide access to the cargo area.
A car with a roof that can be retracted or removed for an open-air driving experience.
A vehicle with a front cab and an open cargo area in the back, often used for hauling.
A family-oriented vehicle with sliding doors and spacious interiors, designed for comfort and practicality.
A vehicle similar to a sedan but with an extended rear cargo area, often featuring a hatch-style trunk.

common_usage: Eco-friendly transport, urban and highway driving
description: A vehicle powered by an electric motor and battery instead of a gasoline engine.
A car that combines a gasoline engine with an electric motor for improved fuel efficiency.
